title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: Newsweek April 2-9, 2021, CGC 9.6LOT 2: Newsweek April 2-9, 2021, CGC 9.0LOT 3: Newsweek April 2-9, 2021, CGC 9.0LOT 4: The Complete Guide To Cryptocurrency, CGC 9.8LOT 5: The Complete Guide To Cryptocurrency, CGC 9.8*Each winner will receive a bonus non-graded crypto related magazine! STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 5th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Cool magazines, just wondering, with the grading frame, is it very expensive to ship them overseas?In any case, here are my bids:Lot 3: 0.0011Lot 5: 0.0011

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: June 04, 2023, 12:56:15 PMLast edit: June 06, 2023, 12:07:48 PM by minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 02, 2023, 11:46:50 PMCool magazines, just wondering, with the grading frame, is it very expensive to ship them overseas?No, would not be any more than a regular package I would send to you or other collectors outside the US.The 3x Newsweek magazines are actually in some of the new capsules from CGC which are about 1/2lb lighter than the older ones, which should hopefully save a few $$ when shipping
